Vladimir Radmanović

Pronunciation: \VLAD-uh-meer rad-MAH-nah-vihch\

Vladimir Radmanović

(Vlad Rad)

Position: Power Forward and Small Forward ▪ Shoots: Right

6-10, 227lb (208cm, 102kg)

Born: November 19, 1980 in Trebinje, Bosnia and Herzegovina ba

Draft: Seattle SuperSonics, 1st round (12th pick, 12th overall), 2001 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: October 30, 2001

Career Length: 12 years

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Vladimir Radmanović?

Vladimir Radmanović is 44 years old.

Where was Vladimir Radmanović born?

Vladimir Radmanović was born in Trebinje, Bosnia and Herzegovina.

When was Vladimir Radmanović born?

Vladimir Radmanović was born on November 19, 1980.

How tall is Vladimir Radmanović?

Vladimir Radmanović is 6-10 (208 cm) tall.

How much did Vladimir Radmanović weigh when playing?

Vladimir Radmanović weighed 227 lbs (102 kg) when playing.

Is Vladimir Radmanović in the Hall of Fame?

Vladimir Radmanović is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Vladimir Radmanović drafted?

Vladimir Radmanović was drafted by Seattle SuperSonics, 1st round (12th pick, 12th overall), 2001 NBA Draft.

What position did Vladimir Radmanović play?

Power Forward and Small Forward.

When did Vladimir Radmanović retire?

Vladimir Radmanović last played in 2013.

What is Vladimir Radmanović's net worth?

Vladimir Radmanović made at least $43,101,141 playing professional basketball.

How much did Vladimir Radmanović make?

Vladimir Radmanović made $6,883,800 in 2011.

What did Vladimir Radmanović average?

Vladimir Radmanović averaged 8.0 points, 3.8 rebounds, and 1.4 assists per game.

How many rings does Vladimir Radmanović have?

Vladimir Radmanović won 0 championships.

What are Vladimir Radmanović's nicknames?

Vlad Rad is a nickname for Vladimir Radmanović.
